post:
ScarabWeb offers many dedicated servers from budget to enterprise servers all to a very affordable prices. Our servers are located in Columbus, Ohio. We operate and own a cage in a Tier 4 Datacenter (everything is fully double reduanted). Our network providers are Xo, Savvis, and other network bones.

Test IP: 199.114.216.131
Test Download: www.scarabweb.com/100mb.bin

All our Servers have Semi-Managed (monitoring, reboot - and more) included and we offer a 100% managed addon for a very low rate.

Are you worried about moving your existing Server/hosting account to us? DON'T worry, we will handle the migration of your existing server/hosting account to your new ordered Dedicated Server for FREE!

All our Servers can be customized and you easily can add memory, second cpu, bigger drives, and more at the ordering wizard!
